paper_title.ja: 熱水変質岩からのK-Ar年代測定用鉱物の分離法．
Iron-rich chlorite from the Toyoha polymetallic vein-type deposit, southwestern Hokkaido, Japan.
paper_title.en: Iron-rich Chlorite from the Toyoha Polymetallic Vein-type Deposit, Southwestern Hokkaido, Japan

description.ja: High-grade lead-zinc-silver are occurs in the Toyoha vein-type deposit, which is located 40 km southwest of Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan. Several K-Ar ages from 3 Ma to 0.5 Ma were reported for the mineralization. It was originally regarded as one of typical epithermal are veins, but can now be considered a polymetallic vein-type deposit, because of the discovery of tin, indium, tungsten and molybdenum minerals from the veins. Main gangue minerals are quartz, calcite, rhodochrosite, chlorite, sericite and kaolin mineral. Illite occurs at the upper levels, and gives place to chlorite at the lower. As a whole, the boundary seems to be a shallower than-150 meter level in the northwestern veins of the mining area, and declines to about-400 meter level in the southeastern veins. Chlorite is one of the abundant hydrothermal minerals throughout the alteration zones of Toyoha deposit. Iron content in the chlorite tends to increase generally toward the ore veins and the chlorite in gangue mineral is almost pure iron-chlorite. Iron-rich chlorite can be formed by an are solution which is in equilibrium with rocks at high temperature and reaches to an ore deposition site.
description.en: High-grade lead-zinc-silver are occurs in the Toyoha vein-type deposit, which is located 40 km southwest of Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan. Several K-Ar ages from 3 Ma to 0.5 Ma were reported for the mineralization. It was originally regarded as one of typical epithermal are veins, but can now be considered a polymetallic vein-type deposit, because of the discovery of tin, indium, tungsten and molybdenum minerals from the veins. Main gangue minerals are quartz, calcite, rhodochrosite, chlorite, sericite and kaolin mineral. Illite occurs at the upper levels, and gives place to chlorite at the lower. As a whole, the boundary seems to be a shallower than-150 meter level in the northwestern veins of the mining area, and declines to about-400 meter level in the southeastern veins. Chlorite is one of the abundant hydrothermal minerals throughout the alteration zones of Toyoha deposit. Iron content in the chlorite tends to increase generally toward the ore veins and the chlorite in gangue mineral is almost pure iron-chlorite. Iron-rich chlorite can be formed by an are solution which is in equilibrium with rocks at high temperature and reaches to an ore deposition site.

paper_title.ja: 大分県杵築地域に分布するNbに富む安山岩
paper_title.en: Nb-rich andesites from Kitsuki area in Oita Prefecture

description.ja: Nb-rich andesites (NRAs ; Nb 27-15ppm) are found in the Miocene Usa Formation which distributes in Kitsuki area, Oita Prefecture. Phenocrysts of the NRAs are euhedral olivines, orthopyroxenes, clinopyroxenes, hornblendes and plagioclases. The NRAs posses SiO_2 contents of 58.1 62.6 and FeO^*/MgO ratios of 1.39 - 2.19,and are rich in TiO_2,K_2O, Ba, Nb, Rb, Pb, Th, Zr and light rare earth elements as well as the alkali basalts. N-MORB-normalized incompatible element patterns of the NRAs are similar to those of the SW Kyushu alkali basalt (JB-1a) and the Oninomi alkali basalt (within-plate type alkali basalt) rather than the Kuju-type basalts (island arc type basalt) and Yabakei-type basalt (intermediate between island arc and within-plate type basalts). The above chemical characteristics suggests that alkali basalt magmas or magma sources might play an important role of the origin of the NRAs.
description.en: Nb-rich andesites (NRAs ; Nb 27-15ppm) are found in the Miocene Usa Formation which distributes in Kitsuki area, Oita Prefecture. Phenocrysts of the NRAs are euhedral olivines, orthopyroxenes, clinopyroxenes, hornblendes and plagioclases. The NRAs posses SiO_2 contents of 58.1 62.6 and FeO^*/MgO ratios of 1.39 - 2.19,and are rich in TiO_2,K_2O, Ba, Nb, Rb, Pb, Th, Zr and light rare earth elements as well as the alkali basalts. N-MORB-normalized incompatible element patterns of the NRAs are similar to those of the SW Kyushu alkali basalt (JB-1a) and the Oninomi alkali basalt (within-plate type alkali basalt) rather than the Kuju-type basalts (island arc type basalt) and Yabakei-type basalt (intermediate between island arc and within-plate type basalts). The above chemical characteristics suggests that alkali basalt magmas or magma sources might play an important role of the origin of the NRAs.

paper_title.ja: 西南北海道積丹半島に分布する熱水鉱床のK-Ar年代(共著)
paper_title.en: K-Ar Ages of several Hydrothermal Ore Deposits in the Shakotan Peninsula, Southwest Hokkaido, Japan.

description.ja:
Various types of hydrothermal ore deposits; copper-lead-zinc vein, manganese vein, manganese strata-bound, barite vein, pyrite vein and Kuroko, are distributed in the Shakotan Peninsula, southwest Hokkaido. K-Ar ages for sericite separated from hydrothermally altered rocks collected from the individual types of ore deposits are as follows; copper-lead-zinc vein (10.22 to 1.99 Ma), manganese vein (6.29 to 3.14 Ma), pyrite vein (2.39 Ma) and barite vein (4.85 Ma). A Kuroko deposit yields 12.27 Ma and a manganese strata-bound deposit, 6.53 Ma.
Newly and previously obtained K-Ar age data, and geological information for the hydrothermal ore deposits in the Shakotan-Shikotsu district suggest that the major ore mineralization are grouped into three epochs; Middle Miocene Kuroko, Late Miocene vein (copper-lead-zinc) and Plio-Pleistocene vein (gold-silver, copper-lead-zinc and manganese). The Late Miocene mineralization is related to the activity of acidic intrusive rocks. The Plio-Pleistocene mineralization age is coincident with that of andesite lavas overlying the vein-type deposits.
description.en:
Various types of hydrothermal ore deposits; copper-lead-zinc vein, manganese vein, manganese strata-bound, barite vein, pyrite vein and Kuroko, are distributed in the Shakotan Peninsula, southwest Hokkaido. K-Ar ages for sericite separated from hydrothermally altered rocks collected from the individual types of ore deposits are as follows; copper-lead-zinc vein (10.22 to 1.99 Ma), manganese vein (6.29 to 3.14 Ma), pyrite vein (2.39 Ma) and barite vein (4.85 Ma). A Kuroko deposit yields 12.27 Ma and a manganese strata-bound deposit, 6.53 Ma.
Newly and previously obtained K-Ar age data, and geological information for the hydrothermal ore deposits in the Shakotan-Shikotsu district suggest that the major ore mineralization are grouped into three epochs; Middle Miocene Kuroko, Late Miocene vein (copper-lead-zinc) and Plio-Pleistocene vein (gold-silver, copper-lead-zinc and manganese). The Late Miocene mineralization is related to the activity of acidic intrusive rocks. The Plio-Pleistocene mineralization age is coincident with that of andesite lavas overlying the vein-type deposits.

description.ja:
１．九州中部地域に分布する金鉱床と火山岩のK-Ar年代測定はほぼ終了したが、今後、九州中部地域で最大の金鉱床である鯛生鉱山の年代測定を行う。
２．九州中部地域の金鉱床周辺に分布する火山岩のXRF分析をほぼ終了した。金鉱床が分布しない地域の火山岩のXRF分析を実施し、比較検討する。
３．萩焼原料粘土である大道土、金峰土、見島土、さらにはろう石鉱床である宇久、滑鉱山についての調査・研究はほぼ終了した。これ以外の粘土資源の調査・研究を新たに実施する。

１．九州中部地域に分布する金鉱床と火山岩のK-Ar年代測定はほぼ終了したが、今後、九州中部地域で最大の金鉱床である鯛生鉱山の年代測定の準備を行う。
２．九州中部地域の金鉱床周辺に分布する火山岩のXRF分析をほぼ終了した。金鉱床が分布しない地域の火山岩のXRF分析を実施し、比較検討する。
３．大道土、金峰土、見島土についての調査・研究はほぼ終了した。これ以外の粘土資源、ろう石や堆積性粘土などの調査・研究を新たに実施する。

１．九州中部地域に分布する金鉱床と火山岩のK-Ar年代はほぼ終了したが，今後，九州中部地域で最大の金鉱床である鯛生鉱床の年代測定の準備をする．
２．九州中部地域の金鉱床周辺に分布する火山岩のＸＲＦをほぼ終了した．金鉱床が分布しない地域の火山岩のＸＲＦ分析を実施し、比較検討する．
３．大道土，金峰土、見島土についての調査・研究はほぼ終了した．これ以外の粘土資源，蝋石や堆積性粘土などの調査・研究を新たに実施する．

１．九州中部地域に分布する金鉱床と火山岩のK-Ar年代はほぼ終了したが，今後，九州中部地域で最大の金鉱床である鯛生鉱床の年代測定の準備をする．
２．九州中部地域の金鉱床周辺に分布する火山岩のＸＲＦをほぼ終了した．金鉱床が分布しない地域の火山岩のＸＲＦ分析を実施し、比較検討する．
３．大道土，金峰土、見島土についての現地調査はほぼ終了した．これからは，それぞれの原料粘土の性状比較を行う．
４．岩盤崩壊が顕著である蛇紋岩を対象にして，地質学・鉱物学的研究を行っている．

２．九州中部地域の金鉱床周辺に分布する火山岩のＸＲＦをほぼ終了した．金鉱床が分布しない地域の火山岩のＸＲＦ分析を実施し、比較検討する．
３．大道土，金峰土、見島土についての現地調査はほぼ終了した．これからは，鉱物学的研究を引き続き行う．
４．岩盤崩壊が顕著である蛇紋岩を対象にして，地質学・鉱物学的研究を行っている．

１．九州中部地域に分布する金鉱床と火山岩のK-Ar年代はほぼ終了した．
２．九州中部地域の金鉱床周辺に分布する火山岩のＸＲＦをほぼ終了した．金鉱床が分布しない国東半島地域の火山岩のＸＲＦ分析を実施した．
３．大道土，金峰土、見島土についての現地調査はほぼ終了した．これからは，鉱物学的研究を行う．
４．岩盤崩壊が顕著である蛇紋岩を対象にして，地質学・鉱物学的研究を行っている．

２．九州中部地域の金鉱床周辺に分布する火山岩のＸＲＦをほぼ終了した．これからは，金鉱床が分布しない地域の火山岩のＸＲＦ分析を実施する．
３．大道土，金峰土についての現地調査はほぼ終了した．見島土の現地調査を実施する予定である．
４．岩盤崩壊が顕著である蛇紋岩を対象にして，地質学・鉱物学的研究を行っている．

２．九州中部地域の金鉱床周辺に分布する火山岩のＸＲＦを開始した．今後は，金鉱床が分布しない地域の火山岩のＸＲＦ分析を実施する．
３．大道土，金峰土についての現地調査はほぼ終了した．見島土の現地調査を実施する予定である．
４．岩盤崩壊が顕著である蛇紋岩を対象にして，地質学・鉱物学的研究を行っている．
